title: How much damage is done to me. I failed in EEE 2ND SEM
content:
So i failed in EEE. Ill clear it but lllets say i cleared it in backlog exam

1).Now assuming the above to be true how much damage it has done to my placement chances?

2).Also is there a rule thay sgpa for each semester should be above 6 to sit for comapnies?

comments.body:
1. If you clear the backlog, then there is 0 damage done

2. Nope, no such rule. Just make sure your final CGPA > 7 to be eligible to sit for placements, although you would want at least an 8-8.5 to be on the safer side.

CGPA stands for Cumulative Graded Point Average. Which means it's the GPA after accounting for all semesters you've completed. 

When you sit for placements, depending on when you apply to a company, your CGPA will either include till 6th sem (for companies visiting in 7th sem) or till 7th sem (for companies visiting in 8th sem).
